name: Amazon Basics Wooden Shape Sorter and Rainbow Stacker Classic Baby Toy Set-Sorting Play For Infants Age 12M+, Medium, Multicolor
short_description: COLORFUL AND CLASSIC: This is a modern take on a classic toy – a stylish, multi-textured sorting and stacking toy with every color in the rainbow! Babies and toddlers are instinctively drawn to the colorful pieces and fun shapes.

TWO-IN-ONE: This is two toys in one: a shape sorter with a box, and a stacker on a wooden dowel. Toddlers use their delicate hands to fit the colorful shapes in the right holes on the top of the box, and to get the stacking pieces in the right order.

DEVELOPMENTAL TOY: Young children learn through play – the different sizes, colors and shapes of the stacking and sorting pieces help them learn the differences between them all. They also develop fine motor skills, and a sense of organization.

FSC-CERTIFIED Sorting & Stacking Toys (FSC N004130): Made with materials from well-managed forests, recycled materials, and/or other controlled wood sources. SAFE AND STURDY: Made from durable plastic, the materials are child-safe and will stand up to tough play.
FOR CHILDREN AGES 12+ MONTHS: The perfect toy for curious toddlers learning to explore the world around them. Help them develop crucial developmental skills as kids approach preschool.
product_description: Product Description Amazon Basics Wooden Shape Sorter and Rainbow Stacker From the Manufacturer Watch your little one’s early development skills blossom before your very eyes with this modern and stylish take on two classic toys: the sorting box and ring stacker. Toddlers and preschoolers can sort the different-colored wooden shapes into the right holes on the top of the sorting box, then practice stacking the rings on the wooden dowel in the right order by size. Toys like these are key to early development of fine motor skills, organization, color identification and knowing their shapes. It also makes for an ideal gift for anyone with a little one just starting to truly get to know the world around them.
